description:
Description
Field trial to assess the effect of ewes deworming (prevention of gastro-intestinal parasitism) on the mortality
of their offspring (age < 1 year). This data set is extracted from a large database on small ruminants production
and health in Senegal (Lancelot et al., 1998). Data were collected in a sample of herds in Kolda (Upper Casamance,
Senegal) during a multi-site survey (FaugÃ¨re et al., 1992). See also the references below for a presentation of the
follow-up survey (FaugÃ¨re and FaugÃ¨re, 1986) and a description of the farming systems (FaugÃ¨re et al., 1990).
title: Mortality of Djallonke Lambs in Senegal

parameters.n: a numeric vector: the number of animals exposed to mortality.
parameters.y: a numeric vector: the number of deaths.
parameters.village: a factor indicating the village of the herd.
parameters.group: a factor with 2 levels: CTRL and TREAT, indicating the treatment.
parameters.trisk: a numeric vector: the exposition time to mortality (in year).

format: A data frame with 21 observations on the following 4 variables.
